column4: i've got some serious problems with my desktop's wireless card (dlink dwc-520 rev e) and using hostap with ubuntu 5.04. anyone familiar with it, building kernels, etc?
anyone successful with getting kernel module hostap and hostap_pci to build?
anyone familiar with building kernels that can help me for a bit? i'm new to the devian world -- but have 5+ years experience with mdk.
